article.title: L-3 Awarded T-1A Jayhawk Logistics Support Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: L-3 Communications' Systems Field Support division was awarded a 60-day base contract with eight option years from the U.S. Air Force to serve as prime contractor on the T-1A Contractor Logistics Support program. The total value of the contract with all options is $680 million.
